config.comments: Log Payload: true (This is criticalit writes the actual message content into the log file).

Partitioning: Added partition_date as the Correlation Attribute to group records by date before merging.
Format: Switched to JsonTreeReader (USGS) and ParquetRecordSetWriter to convert raw JSON into optimized columnar Parquet files.
Efficiency: Set Max Bin Age to 1 minute.
TODO, Set Max Bin Age to 5 minute
